metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:0703-2 -- Recommended update for ksh
metadata.description:
This update to Korn Shell 93u+ provides fixes for many issues, including:
* Fix segmentation fault on typeset on ENV variable. (bnc#803613) * Do not free data which is used later on in the hash tree of reloaded shell functions. (bnc#795324) * Make sure that tty is closed even if an interrupt arrived during close. (bnc#790315) * Fix truncation of variables when TMOUT is used. (bnc#808956) * Fix syntax error on command substitution in here-document. (bnc#804998) * Make Shift_JIS patch more reliable as requested by upstream.
For a comprehensive list of fixes please refer to the package's change log.

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:32977 - Corrected package names in objects and versions in states.
